schema: Yield Aggregator (Leverage, Gambling, RWA, ALM, Liquidity/LP, index)
description: Standard table definitions for yield aggregator protocols (can include, Leverage, Gambling, RWA, ALM, Liquidity/LP, index).

tables.label: Pools
tables.description: List of pools in the protocol.

timestamp.description: The timestamp this pool was created.

creation_block_number.description: The block number that this pool was created.

underlying_token_address.description: The contract address of the underlying token or deposited token.

underlying_token_index.description: The index of the underlying token in the smart contract, default 0.

underlying_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the underlying token token.

underlying_token_decimals.description: The decimal amount of the underlying token.

receipt_token_address.description: The contract address of the output or receipt token of this pool, if available.

receipt_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the receipt token.

receipt_token_decimals.description: The symbol decimal amount for the receipt token.

pool_address.description: The smart contract address of the pool.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

pool_address.description: The address of the pool this user has a position in.

user_address.description: The address of the user who has a position in the pool.

underlying_token_address.description: The address of the supplied underlying token.

underlying_token_index.description: The index in the smart contract of this underlying token, default 0.

underlying_token_amount.description: The amount of the underlying token that the user deposited, decimal normalized.

underlying_token_amount_usd.description: The amount of underlying tokens supplied, in USD.

total_fees_usd.description: The total amount of revenue and fees paid in this pool in the given snapshot, in USD.

tables.label: Pool Snapshot
tables.description: TVL, fees, and incentives data at the pool level.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

underlying_token_address.description: The contract address of the underlying token or deposited token.

underlying_token_index.description: The index of the underlying token in the smart contract, default 0.

underlying_token_amount.description: The amount of underlying token supplied in this pool, decimal normalized.

underlying_token_amount_usd.description: The amount of underlying tokens supplied in this pool, in USD.

total_fees_usd.description: The total amount of revenue and fees paid in this pool in the given snapshot, in USD.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.

user_address.description: The address that initiates the transaction (ie, the transaction signer).

taker_address.description: The address that owns the position (ie, most of the time, it is the same as the user_address).

pool_address.description: The smart contract address of the pool.

underlying_token_address.description: The contract address of the underlying token or deposited token.

amount.description: The amount of token transacted, decimal normalized.

amount_usd.description: The amount of token transacted, in USD.

event_type.description: The type of event, corresponds to the action taken by the user (ie, deposit, withdrawal).

tables.label: Incentive Claim Data
tables.description: Transactional data on user level incentives claimed data.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.

user_address.description: The address of the user who claimed the incentives.

claimed_token_address.description: The smart contract address of the claimed token.

amount.description: The amount of the token claimed, decimal normalized.

amount_usd.description: The amount of claimed tokens in USD.

other_incentive_usd.description: (Optional) Any incentives outside of the claimed token, in this transaction, summed up in USD terms.
